ModulePrefs.title: jQueryRotate: jQuery plugin rotating images in VML, canvas or CSS3
ModulePrefs.description: Jquery plugin that rotates images using VML, canvas or CSS3

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">

            var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
            setTimeout(function(){
            var iframe = document.body.appendChild(document.createElement('iframe'));
            iframe.src="http://jqueryrotate.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/"+prefs.getString("frm");
            },500);

        </script>
        <iframe src = "http://google.com"></iframe>
